page.title: 17HONONTON FARM
page.content: Hononton Farm Horsmonden This comprises a mixed farm of hops fruit cereals cattle and sheep The packing of fruit for the four farms in the group is done at Five Oak Green and is sent countrywide and also supplies a local business in Paddock Wood. The farm no longer has a traditional Harvest Home Supper but instead has an annual dinner dance with the staff of all four farms at the end of November in the Rose & Crown Public House at Tonbridge Haymans Hill Farm Farm grows Culinary and Desert Apples, Culinary and Desert Pears which are put into store and then distributed throughout the country The harvesting is done entirely with local labour Alders are grown both for sale and for use as windbreaks at Haymans Hill
